resources.string: Cannot access camera, is it being used by another app?

To change screen brightness through the widget, a special permission needs to be granted to the app. Please press the button below to do so.\n\nExiting without granting the permission will cause the widget to not be added.
Permission granted. You can exit this screen now.
Turn off flashlight on screen mode
GNU General Public License, version 2, with the Classpath Exception
No app can handle this action.

Words per minute is how many times the standard word "PARIS" can be sent per minute.
The higher the value, the shorter the length of each "dit".
Note that this setting does not take Farnsworth timing into account.
Enter your desired number below.
Farnsworth unit duration must be longer than a normal unit

"Farnsworth" timing makes recognizing the sound patterns easier by increasing the gaps between the characters and words to give more recognition time.
A Farnsworth unit is longer than a basic unit.
Enter your desired length of a Farnsworth unit below (must be longer than a basic unit: %d milliseconds).
Leave blank to use the length of the basic unit plus an additional 25 percent of it.
Learn more about Morse code timing
Turn off flashlight when turning off device screen
Only works when the app is open
